verses.verse: <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> to his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H4940>them,<s%> and with all the family of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Please <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H2896><s%> 'Is it better for you that all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> who are <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H259>you,<s%> or that one <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H2142>you?<s%>' Remember also that I am your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>"

His <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> of him in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> all these <S%H1697>words:<s%> and their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech;<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is our <S%H251>brother.<s%>"

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H7657>seventy<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of Baal <S%H1170>Berith,<s%> with which <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> and <S%H6348>light<s%> <S%H582>fellows,<s%> who <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310>him.<s%>

He <S%H935>went<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> being <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> but <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> was <S%H3498>left;<s%> for he hid <S%H2244>himself.<s%>

All the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> assembled themselves <S%H622>together,<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> by the <S%H436>oak<s%> of the <S%H5324>pillar<s%> that was in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

When they <S%H5046>told<s%> it to <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> "Listen to <S%H1167>me,<s%> you men of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> may listen to <S%H8085>you.<s%>
The <S%H6086>trees<s%> went <S%H1980>forth<s%> on a time to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H559>them;<s%> and they said to the olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> <S%H4427><s%> 'Reign over us.'

"But the olive <S%H2132>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2308>them,<s%> 'Should I leave my <S%H1880>fatness,<s%> with which by me they <S%H3513>honor<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H582>man,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5128>wave<s%> back and forth over the <S%H6086>trees?<s%>'
"The <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Come and reign over <S%H4427>us.<s%>'

"But the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2308>them,<s%> 'Should I leave my <S%H4987>sweetness,<s%> and my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8570>fruit,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5128>wave<s%> back and forth over the <S%H6086>trees?<s%>'
"The <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Come and reign over <S%H4427>us.<s%>'

"The <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2308>them,<s%> 'Should I leave my new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> which <S%H8055>cheers<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H582>man,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5128>wave<s%> back and forth over the <S%H6086>trees?<s%>'
"Then all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H329>bramble,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Come and reign over <S%H4427>us.<s%>'

"The <S%H329>bramble<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H571><s%> 'If in truth you <S%H4886>anoint<s%> me <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H935>you,<s%> then come and take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in my <S%H6738>shade;<s%> and if <S%H784>not,<s%> let fire come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H329>bramble,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>'

"Now <S%H6213>therefore,<s%> if you have dealt <S%H571>truly<s%> and <S%H8549>righteously,<s%> in that you have made <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and if you have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> with <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> to him according to the <S%H1576>deserving<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>
(for my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H7993>you,<s%> and risked his <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%>

and you have risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and have <S%H2026>slain<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and have made <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his female <S%H519>servant,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> because he is your <S%H251>brother<s%>);

if you then have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H571>truly<s%> and <S%H8549>righteously<s%> with <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and with his <S%H1004>house<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> then <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and let him also rejoice in <S%H8055>you:<s%>

but if <S%H784>not,<s%> let fire come <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo;<s%> and let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>"

<S%H3147>Jotham<s%> ran <S%H1272>away,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H876>Beer,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H6440>there,<s%> for fear of <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>
<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> was <S%H7786>prince<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> between <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech:<s%>

that the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> might <S%H935>come,<s%> and that their <S%H1818>blood<s%> might be <S%H7760>laid<s%> on <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> their <S%H251>brother,<s%> who <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H1167>them,<s%> and on the men of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> who <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> his hands to <S%H2026>kill<s%> his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

The <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for him on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they <S%H1497>robbed<s%> all who <S%H5674>came<s%> along that <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H5046>them:<s%> and it was told <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

<S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and went <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> put their trust in <S%H982>him.<s%>

They went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H1219>harvested<s%> their <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H1869>trod<s%> the <S%H6213>grapes,<s%> and held <S%H1974>festival,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>god,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

<S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who is <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and who is <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1121>him?<s%> Isn't he the son of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal?<s%> and <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> his <S%H6496>officer?<s%> <S%H5647>Serve<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem:<s%> but why should we serve <S%H5647>him?<s%>

Would that this <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5414>under<s%> my <S%H3027>hand!<s%> Then I would <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H7235>"Increase<s%> your <S%H6635>army,<s%> and come <S%H3318>out!<s%>"

When <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed,<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H8649>craftily,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1603>"Behold,<s%> Gaal the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and <S%H6696>behold,<s%> they incite the city against <S%H5892>you.<s%>
Now <S%H6965>therefore,<s%> go up by <S%H3915>night,<s%> you and the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are with <S%H693>you,<s%> and lie in wait in the <S%H7704>field:<s%>

and it shall <S%H1242>be,<s%> that in the morning, as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H2224>up,<s%> you shall rise <S%H7925>early,<s%> and rush on the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and <S%H5971>behold,<s%> when he and the people who are with him come <S%H3318>out<s%> against <S%H3027>you,<s%> then may you <S%H6213>do<s%> to them as <S%H3027>you<s%> shall find <S%H4672>occasion.<s%>"

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H3915>him,<s%> by night, and they laid <S%H693>wait<s%> against <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>companies.<s%>

<S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H3993>him,<s%> from the ambush.

When <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2083>Zebul,<s%> <S%H5971>"Behold,<s%> people are <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>" <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>him,<s%> "You see the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> as if they were <S%H582>men.<s%>"

<S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H5971>"Behold,<s%> people are <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> by the <S%H2872>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and one <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> by the way <S%H1870>of<s%> the <S%H436>oak<s%> <S%H1870>of<s%> <S%H6049>Meonenim.<s%>"

Then <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H645>him,<s%> "Now where is your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> that you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H40><s%> 'Who is Abimelech, that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5971>him?<s%>' Isn't this the people that you have <S%H3988>despised?<s%> Please go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> and fight with <S%H3898>them.<s%>"
<S%H1603>Gaal<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7291>chased<s%> <S%H5127>him,<s%> and he fled <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7227>him,<s%> and many <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H2491>wounded,<s%> even to the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H725>Arumah:<s%> and <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> drove <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> that they should not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>
It happened on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2673>divided<s%> them into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies,<s%> and laid <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and he <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H5971>behold,<s%> the people came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> He rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5221>them,<s%> and struck them.

<S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and the <S%H7218>companies<s%> that were with <S%H6584>him,<s%> rushed forward, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> rushed <S%H6584>on<s%> all who were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and struck <S%H5221>them.<s%>

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> all that <S%H3117>day;<s%> and he <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H5422>therein:<s%> and he beat down the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2232>sowed<s%> it with <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

When all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H935>it,<s%> they entered into the <S%H6877>stronghold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H410>of<s%> <S%H1286>Elberith.<s%>
It was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> that all the <S%H1167>men<s%> of the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> were gathered <S%H6908>together.<s%>

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6756>Zalmon,<s%> he and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H40>him;<s%> and Abimelech <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H7134>axe<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> a <S%H7754>bough<s%> from the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> it <S%H7760>up,<s%> and laid it on his <S%H7926>shoulder:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H7200>him,<s%> "What you have seen me <S%H6213>do,<s%> make <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as I have <S%H3644>done!<s%>"

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> likewise <S%H376>each<s%> cut <S%H3772>down<s%> his <S%H7754>bough,<s%> and <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them at the base of the <S%H6877>stronghold,<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H6877>stronghold<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H582>them;<s%> so that all the people of the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H505>also,<s%> about a thousand <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women.<s%>
Then <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> to <S%H8405>Thebez,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H8405>Thebez,<s%> and took <S%H3920>it.<s%>
